    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isExternal(org.forgerock.json.resource.Context context)
      Tests whether the context represents an external routed request, by checking if the client context is present and that it is external

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • isExternal

        public static boolean isExternal(org.forgerock.json.resource.Context context)
        Tests whether the context represents an external routed request, by checking if the client context is present and that it is external
        Parameters:
        context - the context to inspect
        Returns:
        true if the context represents an external request; false otherwise, or if the ClientContext could not be found
